org.opendaylight.dtu.impl.rev141210

Class NetworkGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.dtu.impl.rev141210.NetworkGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.opendaylight.l2switch.loopremover.topology.NetworkGraphService

    public class NetworkGraph
extends Object
implements org.opendaylight.l2switch.loopremover.topology.NetworkGraphService
    Implementation of NetworkGraphService NetworkGraphService. It uses Jung graph library internally to maintain a graph and optimum way to return shortest path using Dijkstra algorithm.
